title: Passages from the English Notebooks, Complete
author: Hawthorne, Nathaniel
snippet: Yesterday it was breezy, sunny, shadowy, showery; and we ordered a cab totake us to Clifton Villa, to call on Mrs. ------, a friend of B------'s,who called on us the day after our arrival. Just, as we were ready tostart, Mrs. ------ again called, and accompanied us back to her house.
